divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting in my hot tub looking at, what I preceived to be, Jupiter orVenus, about 845pm. It was partly cloudy and the planets kept disappearing andreappearing through the clouds. As I was looking at the sky, I noticed 3 brightwhite triangles moving across the sky. One in the lead and the other twoflanking either side of the first. At first glance, I thought it was birds, butId never seen birds flying so late at night and in such unison without faulter.As they disappeared into the clouds, I saw two more white triangles fall fromthe sky horizontally, parallel to eachother to the NE. Then, disappeared behindthe clouds.
trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Santa Cruz
There were no other sightings in Santa Cruz on or around April 20th 2004
